/* req4900DAO.insertReq4900ReqSignInfo */ SELECT COALESCE( SUBSTR(NEW_SIGN_ID, 1, 11) || LPAD( (TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(NEW_SIGN_ID, 12, 5)) + 1) , 5, '0') , 'SIG' || TO_CHAR(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, 'YYYYMMDD') || '00001' ) AS NEW_SIGN_ID FROM ( SELECT MAX(SIGN_ID) AS NEW_SIGN_ID FROM REQ4900 A WHERE 1=1 AND SIGN_ID LIKE 'SIG' || TO_CHAR(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, 'YYYYMMDD') || '%' )
/*req4900DAO.insertReq4900ReqSignInfo 요구사항 결재정보 등록*/ INSERT INTO REQ4900 ( PRJ_ID , /* 프로젝트 ID */ REQ_ID , /* 요구사항 ID */ SIGN_ID , /* 결재 ID */ PROCESS_ID , /* 프로세스 ID */ SIGN_PREV_FLOW_ID , /* 결재 이전 작업흐름ID */ SIGN_FLOW_ID , /* 결재 작업흐름 ID */ SIGN_USR_ID , /* 결재자 ID */ SIGN_CD , /* 결재 승인 상태 */ SIGN_REJECT_CMNT , /* 결재 반려내용 */ SIGN_DTM , /* 결재 일시 */ REG_DTM , /* 최초등록 일시 */ REG_USR_ID , /* 최초등록자 ID */ REG_USR_IP , /* 최초등록자 IP */ MODIFY_DTM , /* 최종수정일시 */ MODIFY_USR_ID , /* 최종수정자 ID */ MODIFY_USR_IP /* 최종수정자 IP */ ) VALUES ( #prjId#, #reqId#, #newSignId#, #processId#, #preFlowId#, #signFlowId#, #signUsrId#, #signCd#, #signRejectCmnt#, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, #regUsrId#, #regUsrIp#, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, #modifyUsrId#, #modifyUsrIp# )
